name: Dean ~ iCounsellor on a Day Off 👍

content.html: Jees… thanks for the Pride Support 👎 What on earth would posess you to think this location was amazing for all non-cis/trans/non-binary & bi/queer/homo developers, possibly even bringing their spouses. Are you being sponsored by Dubai… 🤔🤦🏻‍♂️ 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
content.value:
Jees… thanks for the Pride Support 👎

What on earth would posess you to think this location was amazing for all non-cis/trans/non-binary & bi/queer/homo developers, possibly even bringing their spouses.

Are you being sponsored by Dubai… 🤔🤦🏻‍♂️

🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
